reviews.comments: El departamento es tal cual se ve en las fotos. Muy moderno y confortable. Es super espacioso e iluminado. El ventanal del living con vistas al Nahuel Huapi es lo mas lindo de todo, increíble para ver en todo momento del día. Cecilia muy cordial en todo momento y la comunicación magnifica. Las dos habitaciones muy comodas, el equipamiento de la cocina super completo. La presion del agua en ambos baños excelente. No tuvimos problemas con absolutamente nada. Lo unico que dejo como comentario, sin descontar puntos ni nada porque para mi la estadía es un 10, es que es en un tercer piso por escalera. Yo eso no lo vi en la descripcion. Entre los huespedes estaba mi madre que tiene problemas de rodilla y se nos dificultó un poco subir y bajar tantas veces. Igualmente la pasamos genial. Super recomendado!
El depto es como se ve. Esta en 3 piso por escalera.

Nuestra estadía ha sido estupenda, hemos quedado más que conformes. El departamento es realmente hermoso, con esa ventana al lago, inolvidable. Dos dormitorios amplios con camas muy cómodas y dos baños no es fácil de conseguir. No nos ha faltado nada, como estar en casa, cocina completísima, microondas, tostadora,además de lavarropas, aspiradora, tabla de planchar, smart tv, además de detalles de calidez y buen gusto. Gracias Cecilia por tu amabilidad y responder rápidamente ! Estamos muy felices de haber estado en tu departamento Claire!
Todo impecable, buena ubicación, el departamento es amplio, muy bien decorado. Claire muy atenta
Excelente estadía! Muy recomendable la atención y el Depto excelente. Volveríamos!
Hermosa vista!

Claire es muy amable. Siempre dispuesta a ayudar. La casa es tal cual esta en las fotos. Amplia. Ordenada. Con todos los utensillos para cocinar. Muy buena estadía... es recomendable. Nos cambiaron las toallas porque estuvimos varios días. Volveríamos.

El apartamento es hermoso y tiene todo lo necesario para una excelente estadía en Bariloche. La ubicación es inmejorable. No pudimos conocer a Claire pero siempre estuvimos en contacto, en cambio nos recibió su amiga Sonia que súper simpática y amable. Todo 100 recomendable.
La vista es excelente, tal cual se muestra en las fotos. El departamento es muy lindo.

El departamento esta perfectamente equipado y en excelente estado de conservación.- La vista del living es realmente increíble.- 
Claire y Sonia, fueron dos anfitrionas excelentes, el vino de bienvenida realmente es un detalle agradable.-

Todo excelente! 
Claire siempre pendiente de nuestra estadía. 
El departamento completo, bien equipado, limpio y en una zona tranquila.

El departamento esta muy limpio y cómodo. El edificio no es tan bonito y no tiene elevador, pero la vista lo vale.
Claire fue muy amable con nosotros
El departamento tiene todo lo que uno necesita y más. Claire estuvo siempre atenta a todo lo que uno pudiera necesitar. El departameto está impecable, con una buena vista al lago, super recomendable.
Excelente vista, todo el departamento en buen estado

Estuvimos sólo tres dias en el departamento, aunque es tan lindo que daban ganas de permanecer unos cuantos dias mas. Absolutamente recomendable. Luminoso, impecable y lleno de detalles que hacen muy placentera la estadía. Tiene todo lo necesario y mucho màs. Equipado como la propia casa, hasta te puedes hacer una comida super elaborada como la que harias en tu propia cocina! El barrio super tranquilo, a unas cuadras del centro, de modo que es posible abandonar el auto y disfrutar de moverse a pie. No tiene garage pero no fue un problema, dejamos estacionado el auto en la calle, ya que se trata de una zona muy segura. Claire es una excelente anfitriona, con muy buena actitud de atender cualquier necesidad. Nos dejó mucha informacion turistica a nuestra disposicisión, tarjeta para utilizar el colectivo urbano y hasta nos esperò con un vino, otro detalle más de gentileza y buen gusto. Lo bueno tambien fue la flexibilidad con los horarios de llegada y partida. El departamento es en un tercer piso sin ascensor pero sin lugar a dudas lo alquilaríamos nuevamente si volviéramos a Bariloche. El departamento lo justifica totalmente! fantastico!
Estuvo todo muy bien. El depto tiene una vista increíble y es muy cómoda. ademas esta muy cerca del centro. Eso si...tres pisos x escalera. La dueña muy amable.

Claire es una excelente anfitriona, desde el primer momento se preocupo porque nos sintiéramos cómodos en su casa. Es muy atenta y nos dio recomendaciones de los lugares a visitar y como llegar. El departamento es idéntico a las fotos publicadas y esta situado en un lugar muy tranquilo. La experiencia fue excelente y esperamos volver.
Departamento hermoso, con vista lago increible. Cecilia muy amable y disponible. Departamento perfecto por familias
Es un departamento muy cómodo, con una vista estupenda, una buena ubicación y muy buena atención y detalles por parte de Claire y Sonia!

El departamento de Claire es fantástico, muy cómodo, con todo lo necesario para tener una perfecta estadía en Bariloche. La sala con vista al lago es impresionante y todo es como se muestra en las fotos.

La comunicación fue muy fluida y la llegada sin problemas! Recomendadísimo!

Excelente estadia! El departamento es muy cómodo, amplio, con una vista espectacular y está en perfecto estado. Cocina súper equipada, baños limpios hechos nuevos Y muy cómodos. La ubicación es ideal, a solo unas cuadras del centro cívico por lo que todo está a mano, desde compras a restoranes. Claire y su amiga muy atentas y a disposición inmediata ante cualquier duda o necesidad. Espectacular, no dudaría en volver la próxima vez que este por Bariloche!
Muy buen lugar, excelente ubicación y muy buena atención

Una experiencia excelente! el departamento es hermoso, es super cómodo, esta bien ubicado y tiene una vista increíble! 
Es cerca del centro de la ciudad con muchísimas opciones para comer y disfrutar de unas buenas cervezas artesanales!
Altamente recomendado!!

Muy buena opción, el departamento está muy bien ubicado en el centro, podíamos ir caminando al Centro Cívico, Catedral, Calle Mitre, playa enfrente del Centro Cívico. El departamento muy lindo, una vista espectacular. Estuvimos muy agusto. La atención de Claire fue muy buena, estuvo al pendiente de nosostros.

Estuvimos unos tres dias en casa de Claire. Ella fue muy amable y su piso es asi como aparece en las fotos. La posicion en San Carlos de Bariloche es bastante centrica y entonces resulta muy comodo. Podemos seguramente aconsejar Claire Como una buena host

Nos sentimos muy cómodos en nuestra estadía, el recibimiento estuvo adecuado, incluso nos acogió con un vino de regalo. Dejó a nuestra disposición muchos elementos que nos ayudaron a ubicarnos en Bariloche y a elegir los sitios de mayor interés para visitar en nuestra corta estadía. La ubicación era perfecta. Todo en el departamento estaba perfecto, muy limpio y concordante con lo que anuncia en la página. Definitivamente si volvemos a Bariloche trataremos de volver a su departamento.
Claire nos dejó como gentileza una buena botella de vino, además de té y café. Detalles que se agradecen.

Ella era muy agradable. Cuando llegamos al apartamento, nos recibió con una botella de vino y explicó algunas de las cosas que se puede hacer en Bariloche. Nos dejó una carpeta llena de información y mapas. También nos dio una tarjeta de autobús. El apartamento era exactamente como lo anunció, limpio y hermoso. Ella proveía toallas y café, y podíamos usar la lavadora. El barrio estaba bien, y cerca del centro de la forma descrita. En el último día nos trajo desde el apartamento hasta la estación de autobuses. Recomiendo encarecidamente Claire.

Claire nos recibió en su casa con una botella de vino y una sonrisa, nos dio toda la información necesaria para pasar una linda semana en Bariloche. La casa es amplia y cómoda con una vista increíble. La cocina es totalmente equipada y la calefacción funciona de maravilla. Muy buen lugar para reponerse después de un día de caminata en la montaña.
Excelente lugar, anfitriona y departamento! estamos muy agradecidos con Claire, por su hospitalidad y amabilidad con nosotros! Muy recomendable!!!!!

El apartamento es muy agradable, con mucha luz y un equipamiento funcional, práctica y completo. Con todo lo necesario para pasar dias agradables.
La dueña, Claire, es muy amable y te facilita todo lo que necesites. Tuvo la gentileza de aportarnos lo que necesitamos en las primeras necesidades.
Todo lo que puedo decir es bueno.
Excellent apartment and host
O apartamento é otimo. Claro, tem escadas, mas faz muito bem. Ambiente limpo, junto à Cidade.  Recomendo!!

Cecilia was great!
The apartment is very beautiful and in a good place.
Not so far from the center and in a quite neighborhood.

Thank you!
Beautiful and spacious apartment with lovely views and a great and helpful host.  The apartment even had a good kitchen for cooking in with nice pans and cooking materials.
Quite comfortable, not far from the centre, very caring host. Finding parking for the car was a bit difficult at times.

The place was great, well located, with a wonderful view of the lake, although hilly Bariloche poses a challenge for the unfit traveller. Third floor, no elevator. Reasonable walking distance to most places of interest in Bariloche. Watch your head near the refrigerator. Perfectly equipped, with a satisfactory Wi-FI and even with an Apple TV device. Great choice for staying in Bariloche.

This unit is nicely situated near the center of Bariloche.
Clean, comfortable, well well furnished, complete kitchen. The washing machine was a nice addition after hiking.
Excellent wifi.  Good packet of instructions for the visit- travel, buses, restaurants, and activities.
A good location for several days visit.

The view is just like the pictures--spectacular! Communication was great and everything went smoothly. This is a super-comfortable apartment in a convenient location, near downtown Bariloche and connections to local buses.

Great view of the lake, as pictured. Good location - we walked to town for dinner and rented a car to go hiking. The internet was out when we arrived, but was fixed while we were out the next day. Recommended.

The apartment is warm and cosy. It's spacious and has everything you might need. The view is to die for - each day different.  Just be aware there are three flights of steps to climb to get inside. Location is terrific, and there's a fantastic restaurant on the same street - Huacho - we highly recommend it.

We had a great stay and would recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Bariloche. The pictures accurately depicted the apartment and description was spot on. Sonia was there to greet us upon arrival. A great experience all around.

Nossa viagem foi maravilhosa graças ao apartamento super confortável e com a melhor vista. Tomar café da manhã olhando para o lago ou vendo a neve cair não tem preço. Tudo estava excelente. O Apartamento é melhor do que aparenta nas fotos, muito limpo e organizado, a cozinha bem equipada, preparamos café da manhã, e até jantamos um bife de chorizo. As camas confortáveis, chuveiro quentinho. Não tivemos nenhum problema, inclusive as escadas até o terceiro andar que algumas pessoas comentaram causou incômodo nenhum. Obrigada Claire! Especialmente nosso muito obrigada a Sônia que foi super atenciosa e querida!

Gostamos bastante do apartamento, fomos em 2 casais e nossa experiência foi ótima. A Sônia e Claire nos recebeu muito bem, dando dicas de todos os detalhes. A vista do apartamento é realmente deslumbrante. 
Recomendamos e voltaríamos num piscar de olhos.

O local e excelente, se preparem para as escadas, mas a vista posteriormente do lago e das montanhas vale a pena. Fomos recebidos pela Sônia, super simpática e solocita a sempre ajudar os hospedes, nos deixou uma garrafa de vinho de boas vindas, que achei um charme. Vale a pena se hospedar. Obrigada Sônia por nós receber tão bem. Abraços

Lindo apartamento!!! Vista deslumbrante, limpíssimo e super bem mobiliado! Camas bem confortáveis e super espaçoso. Excelente localização, bem central e próximo a transporte público. Fomos super bem recebidos pela Sonia que nos deixou dicas e mapas.
Um dos meus melhores Airbnb.

Recomendadíssimo! Apartamento muito aconchegante, uma vista realmente incrível, atenção e disponibilidade por parte da Claire e da Sônia. Amamos a estadia, o apartamento fica numa localização privilegiada, próximo ao centro cívico, dá pra ir a vários pontos a pé. Fica no terceiro andar e não tem elevador, ou seja, se não tiver condições de subir com a bagagem melhor procurar outra opção... Mas, se tiver quem carregue o peso, fique nesse apartamento! É perfeito!!!

O apartamento da Clair é ainda mais bonito que as fotos, com uma vista maravilhosa para o lago e uma localização excelente. A calefação funciona perfeitamente bem, além de ter uma uma cozinha muito bem equipada, ótimas instalações, camas e quartos (URL HIDDEN) certeza é uma excelente opção para se ficar em Bariloche. Contamos também com o suporte da Sonia, que foi muito solicita e nos deu todas as informações (URL HIDDEN) certeza recomendamos fortemente o apartamento de Claire!
Appartment is the same as you can see on photos.

This place was fantastic. We were able to walk to to most everywhere we wanted to go, and one day we rented a car, in town, and did the Circuit tour. Highly recommended.
The place was spotless, and the views were amazing. I would stay here again, without hesitation. 
Thank you, Claire.

Great apartment, amazing views! 5-10 min walk to central bariloche. Very close to amazing restaurants. The apartment is lovely, everything is clean, comfortable and appears newly remodeled. Comfortable beds, quite at night and well equipped kitchen.

Claire's place was wonderful. The location and the views were perfect. Claire's friend checked us in early, provided many helpful tips, and arranged a taxi for our return to the airport. The apartment was very clean. They also provided a binder of tourist information, which I ended up referencing quite often. Great stay!
It was great

We stayed at this place with two couples. It's ideal that there were two separate bathrooms. Also the view is really nice from the apartment and when there was something during our stay they responded quickly and friendly. Nice place!
The apartment is spacious, clean , comfortable and well equipped! Her friend Sonia met us and was an absolute gem and very helpful! I highly recommend this place and would certainly stay again !!!

Lovely flat in a great location with wonderful views of the lake. Really close to lots of restaurants and bars and easy for the local buses. 
Kitchen was very well equipped, comfortable beds, clean bathrooms- only downside was that the showers were either scolding hot or freezing, but apart from that it was perfect- would recommend to anyone coming to bariloche! 
Thank you
The apartment is as it looks in the pictures

Claire's place is spacious and clean and has AMAZING views. It is close to everything - it is where you want to be. Claire arranged for a friend (Sonia) to assist us during our stay. She greeted us at the place and gave us great advice for things to do, see, and places to eat. Sonia also arranged for a taxi to the airport on our last day, which we very much appreciated. The bed is very comfortable and the water pressure is great. The place is exactly as described to the description. A nice surprise was the complimentary bottle of wine - nice touch considering we are celebrating our 10 year wedding anniversary. Stay here - you won't be disappointed! ❤️

Claire's apartment was in a great location within easy walking distance of the main street.  The view was amazing.  The apartment was very clean and huge for our family of 4 - we had everything we needed.  
Claire's friend Sonia was very accommodating when we arrived for check in later than expected.  I would definitely recommend this apartment.
Nice view. Reasonable location. 3 floor walk up.

I really would recommend Claire's appartment. It's exactly as described with a wonderful view on Lake Nahuel Huapi. We were three and had so much space for our little chaos, comfortable beds and two bathrooms. The kitchen has really everything what we ever could have need, also a welcome wine :) Wifi is good and the center street with supermarkets, bus station and restaurants just a few minutes by feet.
The communication with Claire is great, she always answeres very fast and is so helpful with all requests. She also organizes to bring back our rental car, when we were in hurry to the airport. We really had a great stay in this feelgood-Place and would always choose Claire's appartment again!
Thanks for everything :)))
The host canceled this reservation 194 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The view of the lake from the apartment is stunning, especially first thing in the morning. The place is quiet and on a secluded street away from the main centre. It's a great base for exploring the town and its environs. Claire was a wonderful host and came immediately when there was a problem (the neighbours changed the lock on the street door without telling anyone!). The wifi was intermittent and best in the morning. We had both hot and cold weather during our stay and the apartment was both cool and warm as necessary. It was also great to get our laundry done. We didn't use the kitchen much as we ate out most of the time. Bariloche is awash with great places to eat.

Unfortunately, the day we arrived the heater and electricity weren't working.  But Claire was on top of things and did everything she could to ensure we were comfortable.  And we were.  The portable heaters and extra blankets were fine.  Luckily, the electricity was only out for a few minutes.  Claire was a gracious host and was extremely responsive.
Great location great view. Would recommend this place to stay. We cooked in the kitchen and it was well equipped with everything we needed. Host was very helpful.

We had a great stay at Claire's place. The photos don't do the view justice, during our stay we had some beautiful violet sunsets . The apartment is located walking distance from the centre and a short drive from Llao Llao. I recommend everyone checks out the Patagonia Cervesaria on the ciruito chico

Great stay in Bariloche! Sonia was delightful and very accommodating with our schedule. She gave great recommendations on places to eat and things to do. The apartment is in a good location with a short walk to the center of town. The view of the mountains waking up in the morning was fantastic and the bottle of wine on arrival was a nice touch as well!

Claire was our initial contact for the transaction and rental  of the apartment.  She was courteous, very responsive and prompt. At the time of our arrival she was abroad, thus, her good friend Sonia welcomed us. Sonia was very sweet,  and provided us with helpful insights and great recommendations around town. She was a delight to work with! They welcomed as with a wonderful bottle of a fantastic local Malbec wine. Don't let the neighborhood fool you. It might look very simple, but the apartment is phenomenal. Parking is easier if you rent a small car. The street is safe especially if you follow the local's advice not to leave any valuables within sight in your car (common sense).  There's a little grocery store about two blocks away from the apartment on the left hand side (200's). It's within walking distance of main streets San Martin and /or Mitre. Majestic view of Nahuel Huapi Lake and the andes: perfect for a family or a romantic getaway. Enjoy!

O apartamento da Claire faz jus às fotos, possuindo uma vista maravilhosa do lago e montanhas nevadas. A localização é ótima, bem próxima ao centro cívico, e o apartamento é confortável, muito aconchegante e propício para uma boa estadia em Bariloche. Adoramos a cortesia deixada pela anfitriã, e encontramos tudo muito bem organizado e limpo. 
Não conhecemos pessoalmente a Claire, mas ela foi representada pela Sonia, a qual merece uma menção especial, pois foi sempre muito solícita, muito atenta às nossas necessidades e nos respondia sempre prontamente por aplicativo de mensagem ou mesmo pessoalmente quando necessário, nos passando informações e dicas sobre passeios e indicações de atividades na cidade, e oferecendo-se por nos atender e auxiliar no que fosse possível em nossa chegada e saída de Bariloche. 
Não tivemos qualquer problema, e certamente recomendamos o apartamento!

Claire was most responsive and a good host. The apartment is coveniently located to stores, restaurants and shopping. The apartment could use another love seat/small couch or additional chair to better accommodate 3
adults.

The host was extremely helpful and did all to make our stay comfortable.
She arranged transport, gave advice on excursions and overall was a very good host.

The apartment lived up to our expectations. The view from the living room IS really stunning. It feels like you're drifting on the river towards the breathtaking ice-capped mountains. Cosy and spacious, the apt was perfect for the four of us. Claire was always very attentive, responsive and helpful when helping us deal with minor things and questions. I would definitely recommend and stay there again!

O apartamento é exatamente como está descrito no anúncio. Claire é muito atenciosa, sempre preocupada com nosso bem estar, pois atende nossas dúvidas com rapidez e no apartamento há tudo que precisamos para nosso conforto.
O apartamento é muito confortável e aconchegante e possui uma vista maravilhosa, o que faz com que nos sintamos em casa e agradecidos por estarmos lá. É bem perto do centro, sendo possível deixar o carro e ir à pé.
Tivemos um pequeno problema com o aquecimento, que foi prontamente entendido por ela.
A única coisa é que o edifício não possui elevador nem estacionamento. Tínhamos muita bagagem mas, sinceramente, o apartamento e a vista compensaram esse ponto (URL HIDDEN) certeza eu voltaria e recomendaria esse apartamento.

Ótimo apartamento, tudo novinho, limpo e organizado. A proprietaria muito atenciosa, deixou uma pasta com varias dicas, mapas...a localizacao tambem ė boa, com certeza indico.linda vista do lago. Voltaremos com certeza.
Beautiful apartment in a great location. Host is helpful and responds quickly.

Claire is the greatest. Super sweet and very attentive to our needs. Incredibly helpful during our stay giving us great suggestions for activities to do and restaurants to enjoy. Anyone thinking about booking this place should definitely do it! Great location as well...5 stars all around.

Apartamento muito bom, aquecimento excelente e uma vista excelente do lago. Apartamento limpo e com todos os utensilios e eletrodomesticos necessarios para preparar as refeições. Quero deixar aqui dois pontos negativos... O primeiro é que não ha elevador e é necessario subir por escada até o terceiro (URL HIDDEN) malas dificulta um pouco e segundo não há garagem e tem que deixar o carro na rua. A localização do apartamento é no melhor ponto de Bariloche. A Claire é uma pessoa adoravel e como mimo tinha um bom vinho nos aguardando na chegada.

This place was perfect for 4! The place was centrally located, clean, quiet and came with a delicious bottle of wine. Also, looks out in the lake which was gorgeous. 
Claire was very helpful, accommodating and sweet. I'd highly recommend this place for anyone staying in Bariloche!
Great apartment in a good location. Claire was awesome, really easy to communicate with and the listing was exactly as described.

Claire was waiting for us when we arrived and gave us a full briefing of the apartment and the area.   A binder was provided for restaurants, transportation and sightseeing ideas. Very thorough and helpful.    The apartment was clean and the view outstanding.  Would not hesitate to rent again.

A spacious apartment with everything in working condition in a quiet and safe street, a short walk from the city centre. Communication with Claire was easy and the complementary wine very good. Thank you Clare.

This was a perfect place to stay in Bariloche. Claire recommended amazing restaurants in walking distance. We were able to walk anywhere in town and still felt like we were a little off the beaten path. The place is beautiful!

The apartment was exactly as described, very spacious and centrally located. The view is truly amazing, and we enjoyed staying there. Pretty much everything is within walking distance, and using public transportation is very easy. We loved staying there and will definitely consider staying again during our next trip. 
We didn't get to meet Claire, but Cecilia followed up on our arrival, welcomed us and made sure we had everything we needed. Overall, great experience!

Fantastic spot, 2 nice big bathrooms, laundry in unit, and fully stocked fridge. View was insanely lovely and they communicated very well! I would come back anytime- it is a 3 story walk up for those of you with mobility issues to be aware of!

The view was amazing and the location was really convenient.  Claire was a very helpful host who gave us tons of info on the area and was quick to respond/easy to communicate with.  The apartment was clean and it came with a bottle of wine.  I would recommend this place to my friends.

Claire's place was lovely, centrally located, and clean. The view of the Rio Negro is breathtaking from the living room window!!! Claire was lovely to talk with, as well as nice and super helpful. She provided us with a lot information that helped us get around and see the area. I would definitely recommend staying there and would stay there again.

Claire was a great host, met us at the apartment upon arrival with an early check-in, she made us feel right at home with everything we needed, she had plenty of printed material to explain all the different excursions you can do around Bariloche, and how to get there etc all the logistics. The apartment is in a perfect location, just enough out of town for quiet but also short walk to the restaurants, bars, shopping and buses for excursions.  The pictures represent the apartment perfectly, feel like you are at home with all the amenities,  and an awesome view of the lake.  I highly recommend staying at Claire's apartment when visiting Bariloche, perfect spot for an unforgettable vacation.
Great!

Foi muito boa nossa primeira experiência de usar o Airbnb, e com certeza a Claire ajudou muito nisso. Ela foi uma anfitriã muito atenciosa, chegou no local no horário combinado e nos passou muitas informações. O apartamento é muito confortável para até quatro pessoas. Fica no terceiro piso, sem elevador, mas com uma vista muito bonita para o (URL HIDDEN) certeza, fez a diferença na nossa viagem.
Excellent flat, everything you need nothing you don't.

Claire was very helpful.  She gave me a reference to a medical clinic when I had a bad cold and I received excellent care.

The apartment has a wonderful view and is conveniently located.  Everything was clean and neat and the apartment had all conveniences including a washing machine.

We are a family of 4 and everyone reported that the beds were comfortable.  The apartment is on the third floor (55 steps) so if someone has mobility problems, you should be aware of this.  Overall, I would give me this a strong recommendation.
Everything could not have been better!  The place was outstanding, clean, comfortable and location great! For sure we will come back!

Claire´s department is wonderful. The view of Lake San Carlos de Bariloche is impressive. Everything is as shown in the pictures. Claire had a loving reception with wine included! She is a very good hostess, providing guidance on main attractions and must see in Bariloche, transportation systems and being around in the city. The place is clean, comfortable, very good location (close to the historical center) and safe (we were traveling with children). It was a happy stay. Thank you!

Clare was an excellent host and her apartment was perfect for our stay. An amazing view of the mountains from the living room. Clare also provides great ideas for things to do in the area. Would stay again next time in Bariloche. She also had a thoughtful welcome / honeymoon gift which was greatly appreciated.

Boa localização e estrutura. Não vou dar nota máxima pois tinha alguns problemas, como falta de elevador e dificuldade de regular a temperatura do chuveiro. Fora esses pequenos problemas, correu tudo bem.

Fomos recebidos por Claire, que nos explicou todos os detalhes do apartamento, muita atenciosa. O apartamento é ótimo, tem uma vista linda para o lago, além de ser mais bonito ao vivo do que nas fotos. Tudo é novo no apartamento e funciona perfeitamente. Os quartos são amplos, cama muito boa e os banheiros também. Recomendo a todos e no próximo ano estaremos lá novamente.

A Claire foi ótima! Nos recebeu muito bem, com muitas dicas e orientações. O apartamento é ótimo! Camas, lençóis e toalhas deliciosos. A cozinha é bem equipada. O que você vê no site representa a realidade. Amei!

Fomos muito bem recebidos pela Claire que nos deu dicas sobre a cidade e facilidades como supermercados, restaurantes e atrações. O apartamento é muito aconchegante, limpo e bem aquecido. Tudo funciona bem.
A localização é ótima, próxima ao centro, com boa disposição para caminhar não precisamos de carro para ir aos restaurantes e principais atrações do centro. 
Nossas crianças de 9 e 11 anos também adoraram a experiência,
Recomendo !!!

A Claire foi uma excelente anfitriã. Por motivos pessoais não pode dar a atenção que gostaria quando da nossa chegada, mas compensou tal fato telefonando para saber como estavam as coisas durante nossa estadia. 
O apartamento é excelente e muito bem localizado, com uma linda vista para o lago Nahuel Huapi. Foi um espaço muito adequado para a nossa família (2 adultos e 2 crianças).
A Claire tem também uma pasta com várias indicações de restaurantes, supermercados, etc e que é bastante útil para os visitantes que não planejaram todos os passos da viagem.
Recomendo!!
The apartment is absolutely stunning. It was clean and well presented, and ideally located. Claire was an excellent host - always very responsive and helpful. Highly recommended!
